# minotaur

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Writing minutes for a meeting can be a time-consuming task. 
This package aims to help you through the labyrinth of minute taking by providing a template and some useful functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of minotaur from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mijon/minotaur")
```

## Overview

The package contains an Rmarkdown template for a set of minutes. 
There are functions for noting decisions and action points.
